name: Gunnihilation
description: Ultraviolent bullet-hell platformer Gunnihilation is dual stick 16-bit mayhem that fuses several forms of 2D shoot 'em up, from run-and-gun classics like Contra and Metal Slug, to the arena-based slaughter of Smash TV.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 555M DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space Additional Notes: 360 or Xbox One gamepads recommended.
